aircraft.value: Condor Tactical - AC-2912-745 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Air conditioning pack failure. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Air Conditioning component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Revise maintenance procedure to include additional verification steps

preventive_action.value: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 04/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 07/10/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 09/10/2024 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 10/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 10/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel
